price: Мана шу улар шубҳаланаётган Ийсо ибн Марям тўғрисидаги ҳақ сўздир.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ عِيسَى ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَۖ قَوۡلَ ٱلۡحَقِّ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: dhālika ʿīsā ub'nu maryama qawla al-ḥaqi alladhī fīhi yamtarūna
